metadata.title: Scam Text Detection ‚Äî ScamAI
metadata.description: Detect scam text messages and fraudulent communications with ScamAI's advanced detection technology.

hero.headline: Instantly Identify and Neutralize
hero.subtitle: Malicious Texts
hero.description: Scam.ai's Text Guardian model analyzes text messages and short-form content in real time to detect and block phishing, smishing, and other text-based scams before a user can click a malicious link or fall for a fraudulent request.

problemSection.headline:
The Threat: The Evolving Threat
in Your Pocket
problemSection.description: Traditional spam filters are no longer enough. Scammers now use sophisticated tactics like personalized messages, URL shorteners, and urgent, emotion-driven language to trick even wary users. These attacks are a direct line to your customers and employees, bypassing many conventional security layers.

valueProps.title: Smishing (SMS Phishing)
valueProps.description: Fake delivery notifications, bank alerts, or password reset links sent via text message.

valueProps.title: Impersonation Scams
valueProps.description: Messages pretending to be from a CEO, colleague, or family member asking for gift cards, wire transfers, or sensitive information.

valueProps.title: Urgency & Scare Tactics
valueProps.description: Fraudulent claims like "Your account has been compromised" or "A warrant has been issued for your arrest" to provoke an immediate, panicked response.

threatLandscape.headline: The Challenge of Text-Based Fraud
threatLandscape.description: Text-based scams have evolved beyond simple spam, using sophisticated psychological manipulation and technical evasion tactics to bypass traditional security measures.
threatLandscape.dataPoint: A 2025 report from the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) shows that financial losses from text-based scams have surpassed those from email phishing for the first time, totaling over $350 million last year alone.

solution.headline: Our Solution: Text Guardian ‚Äî Proactive Threat Detection
solution.description: Text Guardian functions as a sophisticated language analysis engine, understanding the intent and context behind every message to identify malicious behavior with incredible accuracy.

coreDimensions.title: LLM-Powered Intent Analysis
coreDimensions.description: Powered by a proprietary Large Language Model (LLM) fine-tuned on millions of scams from our ScamNet DB, our model goes beyond keywords to understand the true intent, urgency, and manipulative tactics in a message.

coreDimensions.title: Real-Time Link & URL Unmasking
coreDimensions.description: The model automatically analyzes any embedded links, following redirects and checking the final destination against our ScamNet DB for known phishing domains, even if the link is shortened or obfuscated.

coreDimensions.title: Threat Actor Pattern Recognition
coreDimensions.description: Text Guardian identifies and cross-references unique phrases, phone number blocks, and URL patterns associated with known scam campaigns, allowing it to block new attacks that share a common origin.

solution.outputDescription: The model's output is a clear, actionable JSON response containing a risk score, the specific scam type detected (e.g., 'smishing', 'impersonation'), and any identified malicious entities.

advantages.headline: Our Advantage: Why Choose Text Guardian?

items.title: Millisecond-Level Response
items.description: Optimized for high-throughput messaging platforms, ensuring instant analysis without delaying message delivery.

items.title: Unparalleled Accuracy
items.description: Our fine-tuned LLM, trained on the world's largest proprietary database of scam texts, dramatically reduces false positives and detects novel threats.

items.title: Exceptional Robustness
items.description: Effectively understands and analyzes text containing typos, slang, emojis, and multiple languages.

items.title: Constantly Evolving
items.description: Our model is continuously re-trained with the latest scam data from ScamNet DB, ensuring it stays ahead of evolving scammer tactics.

useCases.headline: Use Cases & Applications
items: Telecommunications & Messaging Apps
Enterprise Communications
Financial Services
Online Marketplaces

apiSection.headline: API Integration
apiSection.description: Ready to integrate Text Guardian into your platform? Our comprehensive API documentation provides everything you need to get started, including detailed endpoints, authentication, and code examples.

cta.headline: Take the Next Step
cta.description: Protect your organization with advanced text-based scam detection.

problemSection.additionalContent: Researchers need tools to analyze and detect malicious URLs and QR codes that are used in various attack vectors and fraud schemes.

solution.headline: Our Solution: LinkGuard

coreDimensions.title: URL Analysis

coreDimensions.title: QR Code Decoding

coreDimensions.title: Reputation Scoring

solution.outputDescription: Provides comprehensive analysis with risk scores and detailed threat intelligence for URLs and QR codes.

items.title: High Detection Rate

items.title: Real-time Analysis

items.title: Global Coverage

Developer.title: Built for Developers, Integrated in Minutes.
Developer.code:
import scamai

client = scamai.Client(api_key="sk_live_...")

# Detect deepfake in real-time
check = client.detect.image(
    url="https://user-upload.jpg",
    sensitivity="high"
)

if check.is_fake:
    print("Blocked: %s (%s%%)" % (check.reason, check.confidence))

hero.title: Scam-Related News
hero.description: Latest news and updates on AI-powered scams, deepfakes, and fraud prevention.

cta.title: Stay Informed About Scam Trends
cta.description: Get the latest updates on emerging scam tactics and protection strategies. Follow our research and news coverage.

items.title: WARNING: Deepfake CEO Scams
items.summary: Cybersecurity experts warn sophisticated scams are no longer futuristic, but a present-day threat requiring urgent safeguards.

items.title: AI Deepfake Scandal at HKU
items.summary: A law student at Hong Kong University allegedly used AI to create over 700 non-consensual deepfake pornographic images of classmates and teachers. Legal gap exposed.

items.title: Dr. Sanjay Gupta Warns on AI Scam
items.summary: Scammers used AI to create fake videos and images of CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta, promoting bogus health products in his name. Gupta responded publicly to warn people against the scam.

items.title: AI Fakes Are Easier Than Ever
items.summary: AI is making it easier than ever to fake voices and faces, threatening trust in politics, business, and media. Deepfakes of public figures like Marco Rubio show how real these impersonations can look.

items.title: Why Spotting Dangerous AI Is More Urgent Than Ever
items.summary: A World Economic Forum report warns that AI-powered impersonation marks the shift from disinformation to targeted attacks on business trust. From voice-cloning scams to deepfake fraud, unchecked AI is eroding trust.

items.title: Can You Tell What's Real?
items.summary: AI video tools like Google's Veo 3 are now generating lifelike visuals and audio so realistic they blur the line between fact and fiction. Watch the clips below and see if you can tell which are real and which are AI-generated.

items.title: Sexualized AI Images on Facebook
items.summary: CBS News uncovered hundreds of ads across Facebook, Instagram, Threads, and Messenger promoting "nudify" AI tools that create sexualized images of real people without consent.

hero.title: Types of Scams
hero.description: Understanding the different types of scams and how ScamAI protects against them.

items.title: Voice Cloning Scam
items.description: AI voice replicas impersonating trusted individuals to steal information.

items.title: Face Swapping Scam
items.description: Deepfake videos and images used for blackmail and fraud.

items.title: AI-Generated Images Scam
items.description: Synthetic media designed to deceive and manipulate victims.

items.title: Identity Theft Scam
items.description: Stealing personal information for fraud and unauthorized purchases.

items.title: Financial Investment Scam
items.description: Fake investment opportunities with unrealistic returns.

items.title: Romance Scam
items.description: Fake online relationships to extract money and gifts.

hero.title: AI Voice Cloning Scams
hero.description: A new wave of sophisticated scams is leveraging artificial intelligence to replicate the voices of people you trust. Here's a breakdown of how these scams work, the warning signs to look for, and the steps you can take to protect yourself.

whatIs.title: What is Voice Clone Scam?
whatIs.description: Attackers use AI to replicate real voices with high accuracy, making calls that sound nearly identical to trusted colleagues, leaders, or relatives. These synthetic voices are often used to demand money transfers, share confidential data, or override normal processes.
whatIs.highlight: A familiar voice is no longer a guarantee of authenticity. Verifying a caller's identity through a separate channel is now essential.

warning.title: Warning Signs:
items: Voice sounds right but speech rhythm or emotional tone feels unnatural.
Caller insists on urgency, secrecy, or skipping normal checks.
Inconsistencies in background noise, echo, or call quality.
Refusal to verify through other secure channels.

protect.title: Protect Yourself:
protect.description: Stay vigilant and use multiple verification methods to protect yourself from voice cloning scams:

items.title: Establish Security Policies
items.description: Establish policies that no sensitive or financial action can be taken based on a single voice request.

items.title: Train Your Team
items.description: Train employees to recognize voice cloning tactics and unusual caller behavior.

items.title: Multi-Channel Verification
items.description: Require multi-channel verification. Callback to known number, secure messaging, or in-person confirmation.

items.title: Layered Approval Process
items.description: Keep layered approval processes in place for financial or sensitive requests.

cta.title: How Can Our Product Help?
cta.description: Our advanced voice cloning detection technology provides real-time protection against AI-generated voice fraud, helping you stay one step ahead of scammers.

hero.title: AI Face Swapping Scams
hero.description: Advanced AI technology is being used to create convincing fake videos and images by swapping faces. These deepfake scams can be incredibly persuasive, making it difficult to distinguish between real and manipulated content.

whatIs.title: What is a Face Swapping Scam?
whatIs.description: Criminals use advanced AI to manipulate or generate video footage, replacing a person's face or simulating real-time video calls. These deepfakes can convincingly impersonate leaders, employees, or public figures to deceive viewers and drive harmful actions.
whatIs.highlight: Seeing is no longer believing. AI-generated face swaps can create convincing fake videos that are nearly impossible to detect with the naked eye.

warning.title: Warning Signs:
items: Lip movements not perfectly aligned with spoken words.
Irregular eye blinking, unnatural facial movements, or distortions.
Lighting, shadows, or reflections inconsistent with the environment.
Unexpected video call requests from unusual or spoofed accounts.

protect.title: Protect Yourself:
protect.description: Stay vigilant and use multiple verification methods to protect yourself from face swapping scams:

items.title: Verify Identity Beyond Video
items.description: Do not rely on video presence alone as proof of identity.

items.title: Implement Secondary Verification
items.description: Implement protocols requiring secondary verification for sensitive instructions given over video.

items.title: Educate Your Team
items.description: Educate staff that "seeing is believing" no longer applies in the AI era.

items.title: Use Secure Collaboration Tools
items.description: Use secure collaboration tools with stronger authentication methods.

cta.title: How Can Our Product Help?
cta.description: Our advanced face swapping detection technology uses sophisticated AI algorithms to identify manipulated content and protect you from deepfake scams.

hero.title: Identity Theft Scams
hero.description: Identity theft is one of the most devastating types of fraud. Scammers steal personal information to open accounts, make purchases, or commit crimes in your name, leaving you to deal with the financial and legal consequences.

whatIs.title: What is Identity Theft?
whatIs.description: Scammers misuse stolen, leaked, or AI-synthesized identity data to impersonate individuals or create synthetic profiles. These stolen identities are used to bypass verification, gain unauthorized access, or open fraudulent accounts.
whatIs.highlight: Identity theft can go undetected for months, allowing scammers to cause extensive damage before you even realize what's happening.

warning.title: Warning Signs:
items: Multiple accounts sharing the same contact details or credentials.
Inconsistencies between official documents, financial history, or identity records.
Requests to skip standard onboarding, due diligence, or background checks.
Unexpected alerts such as new account activity, login attempts, or verification prompts.

protect.title: Protect Yourself:
protect.description: Take proactive steps to protect your identity and personal information:

items.title: Strong Onboarding Verification
items.description: Enforce strong onboarding verification, including biometric or multi-factor authentication.

items.title: Monitor Account Activity
items.description: Monitor accounts for unusual activity or overlapping identity details.

items.title: Restrict Data Access
items.description: Restrict access to sensitive data and apply least-privilege principles.

items.title: Regular Security Audits
items.description: Conduct regular audits to identify and remove compromised or fraudulent accounts.

cta.title: How Can Our Product Help?
cta.description: Our identity theft protection technology monitors your personal information across the dark web and alerts you to potential threats before they become serious problems.

hero.title: Financial Investment Scams
hero.description: Investment scams promise high returns with little risk, but they're designed to steal your money. Scammers use sophisticated tactics to make fraudulent investments appear legitimate and profitable.

whatIs.title: What is a Financial Investment Scam?
whatIs.description: AI-generated voices, videos, and documents are used to create fraudulent payment requests or financial approvals. These scams exploit trust in official-looking communications to redirect funds or authorize unauthorized transactions.
whatIs.highlight: If an investment opportunity sounds too good to be true, it probably is. Legitimate investments rarely promise guaranteed high returns with no risk.

warning.title: Warning Signs:
items: Requests for urgent wire transfers or payments outside of established workflows.
Instructions to bypass multi-step approval or compliance checks.
Slightly altered sender details such as email domains or account numbers.
Payment requests inconsistent with past vendor history or financial records.

protect.title: Protect Yourself:
protect.description: Protect your money by following these essential investment safety guidelines:

items.title: Multi-Level Approvals
items.description: Require dual or multi-level approvals for all high-value financial actions.

items.title: Verify Payment Requests
items.description: Verify payment requests through known contacts and trusted channels.

items.title: Vendor Validation
items.description: Maintain strict vendor validation and regularly update payment records.

items.title: Transaction Monitoring
items.description: Monitor for anomalies in transaction amounts, timing, or beneficiary details.

cta.title: How Can Our Product Help?
cta.description: Our investment scam detection technology analyzes investment opportunities and alerts you to potential fraud before you risk your money.

hero.title: Romance Scams
hero.description: Romance scams target people looking for love and companionship. Scammers create fake online personas and build emotional connections with victims, only to exploit their trust for financial gain.

whatIs.title: What is a Romance Scam?
whatIs.description: Fraudsters create AI-driven personas on social or dating platforms, using synthetic images, text, and even voices to build trust. Once trust is established, they exploit victims emotionally or financially, often escalating requests over time.
whatIs.highlight: Romance scammers are masters of manipulation, using emotional tactics to exploit victims' desire for love and connection.

warning.title: Warning Signs:
items: Profiles with flawless images, little personal history, or recently created accounts.
Rapid emotional escalation, constant flattery, or "love-bombing."
Consistent avoidance of live meetings or verifiable video calls.
Repeated or escalating requests for money, crypto, or gift cards.

protect.title: Protect Yourself:
protect.description: Protect your heart and your wallet from romance scams with these essential safety tips:

items.title: Healthy Skepticism
items.description: Encourage healthy skepticism of online relationships that develop unusually quickly.

items.title: Avoid Financial Requests
items.description: Avoid sending money or sensitive personal data to individuals met only online.

items.title: Verify Identities
items.description: Verify identities through independent and trusted methods.

items.title: Report Suspicious Activity
items.description: Report suspicious accounts to platform administrators and security teams.

cta.title: How Can Our Product Help?
cta.description: Our romance scam detection technology analyzes online profiles and communication patterns to identify potential fraudsters before they can exploit your emotions.

hero.title: AI-Generated Images Scam Detection: Deepfake Prevention Guide
hero.description: Artificial intelligence can now create incredibly realistic synthetic images that never existed. Learn how to detect AI-generated images, deepfakes, and protect yourself from sophisticated scam detection challenges. Our comprehensive guide covers deepfake detection techniques and AI scam prevention strategies.
hero.exampleDescription: Example of sophisticated AI-generated imagery used in scams

whatIs.title: What is AI Scam Detection for Synthetic Images?
whatIs.description: AI scam detection focuses on identifying deepfakes and synthetic images created by artificial intelligence. These AI-generated images are used in fraud schemes, creating fake profiles, fabricated documents, and misleading media. Advanced scam detection tools help identify these synthetic images before they can deceive victims. Deepfake detection technology analyzes visual artifacts that distinguish real photos from AI-generated content.
whatIs.highlight: Modern deepfake detection and AI scam detection tools are essential because AI-generated images are now so realistic that even experts struggle to distinguish them from authentic photographs without proper scam detection technology.

warning.title: Deepfake Detection Warning Signs for AI Scam Prevention
warning.description: Professional scam detection requires identifying these key indicators that reveal AI-generated content and deepfakes:

items.label: Lighting inconsistencies:
items.text: Shadows, reflections, or lighting that don't match the surrounding scene - a key deepfake detection indicator.

items.label: Facial distortions:
items.text: Asymmetrical features, distorted hands, teeth, or accessories that AI scam detection tools commonly identify.

items.label: Texture anomalies:
items.text: Overly smooth skin textures or unnatural background blending typical in AI-generated images.

items.label: Missing metadata:
items.text: Photos lacking verifiable metadata or source information - essential for proper scam detection verification.

protect.title: AI Scam Detection Best Practices: Deepfake Prevention Strategies
protect.description: Implement these proven deepfake detection and AI scam prevention methods to protect against synthetic media fraud:

items.title: Advanced Deepfake Detection Analysis
items.description: Implement systematic AI scam detection protocols for all visual evidence. Use professional deepfake detection software to verify image authenticity before making decisions.

items.title: AI Scam Detection Tools Integration
items.description: Deploy reverse image search, forensic analysis tools, and automated scam detection systems to validate suspicious photos and identify AI-generated content.

items.title: Multi-Factor Verification for Scam Detection
items.description: Require multiple independent verification sources before trusting visual content. Cross-reference with deepfake detection databases and AI scam reporting systems.

items.title: Professional Deepfake Detection Training
items.description: Train staff in advanced AI scam detection techniques, visual artifact identification, and proper use of deepfake detection technology for comprehensive fraud prevention.

cta.title: Professional AI Scam Detection & Deepfake Prevention Solutions
cta.description: Our enterprise-grade deepfake detection technology combines advanced AI scam detection algorithms with real-time analysis to identify synthetic images, deepfakes, and AI-generated content. Protect your organization with industry-leading scam detection tools designed for comprehensive fraud prevention.
cta.buttonTitle: Try our AI scam detection and deepfake prevention demo

items.title: Deepfake Detection Technology

metadata.title: ScamNet Database ‚Äî ScamAI
metadata.description: Access the world's largest database of scam patterns and fraudulent content for research.

hero.headline: The Intelligence Engine Powering
hero.subtitle: Next-Generation Fraud Defense
hero.description: Welcome to ScamNet DB, the most comprehensive and real-time database of active scams on the planet. This is not just a static blocklist; it's a living ecosystem of threat intelligence that forms the core foundation of the entire Scam.ai platform.

problemSection.headline:
The Threat: Outpacing
the Speed of Scams
problemSection.description: Scammers launch and discard fraudulent domains, phone numbers, and crypto wallets in minutes. By the time traditional threat intelligence reports are published, the damage is done and the attackers have moved on. Fighting a real-time threat with outdated data is a losing battle.

valueProps.title: Rapid Mutation
valueProps.description: Scammers constantly change their tactics, content, and infrastructure to evade detection.

valueProps.title: Siloed Information
valueProps.description: Threat data is often scattered across different platforms, making it impossible to see the full picture of a coordinated attack.

valueProps.title: Data Latency
valueProps.description: Static blocklists are often hours or days old, leaving a critical window of vulnerability open.

threatLandscape.headline: The Challenge of Real-Time Threat Intelligence
threatLandscape.description: Traditional threat intelligence cannot keep pace with modern scam operations that evolve and adapt in real-time, requiring a fundamentally different approach to threat detection and prevention.
threatLandscape.dataPoint: In 2025, the average lifespan of a phishing website is less than 4 hours, making real-time intelligence the only effective defense.

solution.headline: Our Solution: ScamNet DB ‚Äî A Living Intelligence Ecosystem
solution.description: ScamNet DB is designed to ingest, process, and act on threat data at machine speed. It provides the crucial context and ground truth needed to power effective, real-time fraud detection.

coreDimensions.title: Multi-Source, Global Ingestion Engine
coreDimensions.description: We collect data from a massive network of reliable sources, including dark web monitoring, a global honeypot network, direct user reports, and proprietary data feeds from our partners.

coreDimensions.title: AI-Powered Correlation & Enrichment
coreDimensions.description: Our AI engine instantly processes and enriches raw data, linking seemingly unrelated entities. It connects a scammer's phone number to the phishing link they sent, the scam content used, the crypto wallet for payment, and the time of the report.

coreDimensions.title: Instantaneous Verification & Propagation
coreDimensions.description: Verified intelligence is propagated across our network in milliseconds. When a new scam is detected, every Scam.ai model is instantly updated and ready to block it.

solution.outputDescription: The API returns a rich JSON object containing an entity's risk score, history, and all known connections to other malicious infrastructure.

items.title: Massive Scale
items.description: Contains tens of millions of continuously updated, verified entries, including fraudulent phone numbers, domains, email addresses, crypto wallets, and more.

items.title: Real-Time Speed
items.description: Responds to API queries in milliseconds, providing instant risk assessment for your applications. New threats are added to the database the moment they are detected.

items.title: Unmatched Richness
items.description: Provides deep context, not just a "bad/not bad" label. Understand the history, connections, and risk profile of any entity.

items.title: Platform Synergy
items.description: This is the single source of truth that trains, validates, and powers all other Scam.ai models. It's why our detection products are always smarter and faster. ‚ö°Ô∏è

useCases.headline: Use Cases & Applications
items: Threat Intelligence Enrichment
Proactive Infrastructure Blocking
Security Research & Forensics
Transaction & Onboarding Risk Assessment

apiSection.headline: API Integration
apiSection.description: Ready to integrate ScamNet DB into your platform? Our comprehensive API documentation provides everything you need to get started, including detailed endpoints, authentication, and code examples.

cta.headline: Harness Our Core Intelligence
cta.description: Power your fraud detection with the world's most comprehensive real-time scam database.
